column1: full on middle, and going down the leg side. Imam misses the flick, and the ball goes through to the keeper
back of a length on off, and angling into Imam. Defended off the back foot to Fakhar
back of a length on middle, and Imam flicks this fine down the leg side. Work for Murray, the keeper, as he runs towards fine leg to intercept
short and wide outside off, and Fakhar tries to cut this square. Goes straight to W Masakadza at backwad point though. It was a loose ball for a new batsman, and he'll be disappointed to miss out
full outside off, but angling into Fakhar sharply. He leaves the ball, and the delivery goes just past the outside of off stump

full outside off, and that's been beautifully struck! An expansive drive through cover, but Moor drives to his left and sticks his hand out to stop the ball. An excellent stop which definitely saves four
length ball that angles into the batsman's body. Defended off the back foot
back of a length on leg stump, and Fakhar can't whip this off his pads. Hits his thigh guard and flies away to the off side
full on middle, and driven through the line to the on side. Mistimed, however, and the ball trickles away to mid on
full on middle, and pushed with soft hands to the leg side. Nice and early call for a quick single
back of a length on leg stump, and Imam shuffles to nudge this around the corner to fine leg.

full on middle, and tentatively played to mid off with gentle hands. They take off for another single, and the batsmen cross the line with ease. Mid off tried to run him out at the non-striker's, but Fakhar was already in
length ball on middle, and defended off the back foot with the angled bat. Played to the leg side
length ball on middle, and worked off his pads to the square leg fielder on the leg side
full outside off, and driven square off the front foot. Slices the shot to cover point eventually
short on off, and Fakhar misses out on the pull. Change of pace from Mpofu, and Fakhar's through his shot too early. Appeal for caught behind turned down
good length outside off, and firmly punched off the back foot. The ball whizzes straight to mid off
full on middle, and worked off his pads to the fielder at midwicket. Can't find the gap
short outside off, but this time he can't generate the bounce. Zaman rides the bounce and pulls this square to the fence. Played along the ground, that's the morning's first boundary!
full on off, and Imam comes forward to defend. Takes the outside edge though and the delivery rolls away to the fielder at third man
full outside off, and he tries to muscle this drive through the covers. Doesn't get to the pitch of the ball, and mistimes the shot to cover
full on off, and driven to mid off from the front foot. Straight to the fielder once again
good length on middle, but angling across Imam. Tries to punch it straight down the ground, but the ball takes an inside edge to the leg side instead
good length on leg stump, and Imam uses his toes to get on top of this delivery. Flicks to the leg side, but goes straight to square leg
length ball on middle, and cut away square off the back foot. The batsman had lost his balance, because the ball was so close to him, but he still managed to steer it to the fielder at point
length ball outside off, and he stays on the back foot to punch. Played to cover
full outside off and driven to cover off the front foot. Can't pierce the gap though
too full outside off, and Fakhar gets to the pitch of the ball and crunches this through the covers. Finally beats the gap, and that's four more!
good length on off, and worked to midwicket off the front foot
back of a length outside off, and fended off the back foot to point. Cramped for space
back of a length outside off, and that's been cut away fine to third man. Work for the man there, but he manages to intercept. A couple for Imam
length ball on middle, and he tries to slap this away to point. He's overstepped though!
bowled him! But it's a free hit. Went for a leg-side slog over cow corner, but totally missed out on this full toss.
good length on middle, and Fakhar carefully blocks this off the back foot
length ball on middle, and the swipe to the leg side finds the inside edge off Fakhar. The ball rolls away to third man for two
full on off, and driven firmly down the ground off the front foot. Finds mid off though
length ball on middle, and muscled to the leg side off the back foot. Well stopped by Liam Roche at midwicket
length ball outside off, and cut away through point! There's the World Record - quickest to 1000 ODI runs. He raises his bat. Gets to it in his 18th innings, beats Viv Richards' 21-innings record
good length outside off, and cut away hard. Takes the bottom edge and rolls away to third man
full outside off, and driven with soft hands to mid off. Smothers this to the fielder
good length outside off, and the pull has been jabbed away to mid on. Chigumbura dives to stop the ball
good length outside off, and Imam goes fishing outside off! Sticks his bat out, hoping to defend away from his body, but the ball goes past his outside edge. So close!
good length outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover. Can't find the gap
good length on off, and that's been whipped off his pads to the fielder at midwicket. Enough time to sneak a single
good length on middle, and pulled off the back foot! Played along the ground, but midwicket can't get his fingertips to this shot. Beats the fielder, and there's no stopping that thereafter
full on off, and he gets to the pitch of the delivery before driving to mid off
back of a length outside off, and that's been slapped through the off side! Confidently pushed in front of cover
full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover. Stopped by the fielder there
deft! Length ball on middle, but Imam steers this late cut through to third man for two more. Ten off the over already

length ball on off, and defended off the front foot. The ball rolls to mid off as Imam takes off for the single, but Fakhar isn't interested in the run, and asks his partner to go back into his crease
good length on off, but it's the slower ball from Mpofu this time. Fended off the back foot
length ball outside off, and Fakhar stays on the back foot. Punched to cover point off his toes
good length on off, and that's been lifted over midwicket! Simple pull from Fakhar, and the ball almost goes for a maximum
full outside off, and driven away from his body. Mistimed to cover point, but enough time to race away for a quick single
good length outside off, and steered off the back foot to third man
good length on off, and once again pulled across the line to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
good length on middle, but pulled away in front of square. Mistimes it, but still beats mid on to go for four
good length outside off, and the pull takes a bottom edge! Beats the diving keeper, and the ball gallops away to the fine-leg boundary
good length outside off, and the ball is angling away from him. Left alone
full just outside off, and driven off the front foot to mid off. Imam wants to rotate the strike, but can't
full outside off, and driven away from his body. Takes the outside edge, and the ball goes straight through the vacant slip cordon
full outside off and Imam shoulders his arms on this occasion. Left alone
full on off, and Imam goes down on one knee to execute a perfect cover drive through the off side! Shades of Sourav Ganguly and Kumar Sangakkara in that shot
good length on leg stump, and punched off the back foot to short mid on
full on leg stump, and Fakhar pushes off the front foot to midwicket
full on leg stump, and Fakhar works it with the spin to the leg side
appeal for lbw! But impact's outside leg. Fakhar tried to sweep this square, but the ball straightened slightly
length ball on off, and Fakhar tries to cut it square. Misses the shot, and the keeper fumbles as well. Was there an edge?
full on off, and driven off the front foot to mid off. Starts off with a maiden
good length on off, and he slaps this to point off the front foot. The ball was always angling away from him
full outside off, and in the slot for Imam to drive. Down on one knee again, and crunched to the sweeper fielder on the off side
good length on middle, and Fakhar tries to muscle this past Imam. Too close to his body, and the ball comes off his inside half
full outside off, and Fakhar tries to slap this away from his body. The ball stays slightly low, and it goes under his bat and through to the keeper
full on middle, and Fakhar wields his bat like a sword! Drills this square to the deep backward square fielder
back of a length on middle, and Fakhar has no trouble in confidently pulling through to the square fielder on the boundary
good length on middle, and spinning away from him. Cut to the point fielder
full on leg stump, and nudged off his pads to the leg side. Straight to short fine leg
good length on middle, and punched off the back foot to mid off
full on middle, and he slogs to the leg side
good length on middle, and the ball takes some extra bounce! But manages to cut it away to the fielder in the deep
good length on middle, and punched off the back foot to the fielder at long on. They walk across for one
full on off, and driven off the front foot. But he's overbalancing, and therefore mistimed to mid off
full on off, and defended off the front foot. Stopped by short cover
full on off, and driven away from his body. Pushed to the sweeper fielder for one
full outside off, but pushed too wide outside off. He's got to bowl that again
full outside off, and Fakhar reaches at this wide ball. Mistimed to the off side
full outside off, and pushed to cover. Mistimed, but enough to take two
length ball on middle, and punched to mid off. Enough time to scamper across for one
good length outside off, and slapped off the back foot to point
full outside off, and that's been caressed through to the extra cover boundary! Gets to the pitch of the delivery and simply leans into the drive
half-tracker on middle, and he backs away to cut this off the back foot. Goes to the fielder in the deep
full on middle, and Imam takes a big stride forward to defend
good length outside leg stump, and Imam uses his feet to skip to the pitch of the ball. But he misses his defense, and the ball hits his front leg
length ball on middle, and now Imam's seeing these balls like watermelons! Rocks back and cuts off the back foot to deep point for four
full outside leg stump, and Fakhar clears his front leg. Drives to long on for one
length ball on leg stump, and flicked off his pads to the square-leg boundary
full on leg stump, and defended off the front foot to the leg side
good length on leg, and Fakhar backs away to make some room. Tries to cut it away, but all he can do is mistime it to the bowler
full on leg stump, and he takes a big stride forward. Drive to wide long on
good length on leg stump, and nudged around the corner to the sweeper fielder on the leg side. Could be close but the batsman put in the hard yards to complete the double
good length on middle, and turning away from Imam. Cut to the sweeper fielder on the off side for one
down the leg side! And the keeper can't hold on either. Imam tried to flick it fine, but he missed, and so did Ryan Murray. Free runs for Pakistan
tossed up outside leg stump again, and this time Imam gets bat to ball. Flicked, but straight into the keeper's pads, and the ball rolls away to short fine leg
good length on leg stump, and flicked off his pads to deep square leg
good length outside off, and the wide delivery is cut to point. Fakhar would be disappointed though. It was in the slot to be creamed for four
full on off, and defended off the front foot
half-tracker on middle, and Imam uses the depth of his crease to fine leg. Imam raises his bat for fifty!
full outside leg stump, and nudged off the front foot to deep backward square leg
good length on middle, and he charges down the ground to punch to long on
full on leg stump, but Fakhar comes down the ground to give the bowler a charge. But he effectively yorks himself, and squeezes this back to mid on
full on middle, and he comes down the ground to drive to long off. They walk across for one
good length on off, and spinning into the batsman's body. Turned off his hips to deep square leg
good length outside leg, and he backs away to cut in front of square. Carved beautifully to the extra-cover boundary, and that's another fifty for Fakhar Zaman!
beats the bat first up! A pretty poor ball, to be honest, short and wide, and Imam snatches at that cut, goes too hard at it and misses
fuller now, closer to off stump, pushed gently into the extra-cover region and they scamper a quick run
shortish outside off, punched to the right of extra-cover. Once again Hamilton Masakadza is a touch slow to the ball, allowing a fairly easy single
on the stumps now, blocked to midwicket
full, angling into the legs, clipped off the toes to the right of deep square leg
back of a length, close to off stump, goes back to defend to midwicket
length ball on off stump, punched to long-on with the full face showing
tossed up on middle and leg, Imam plays a straight-bat push to midwicket
a touch fuller, gets forward to clip to deep square leg
jumps down the pitch, makes some room to get adjacent to this leg-stump ball and flat-bat it hard to long-on
slants this down the leg side. Imam misses the paddle-sweep and Murray misses the ball
full now, on middle stump, blocked to midwicket
length ball turning into leg stump, punched to midwicket, who dives right to save the single to long-on
back of a length on off stump, goes deep in his crease to work it with the turn to deep square leg
back of a length, close to off stump, punched to the left of deep point
slow, full and wide. Plenty of time to get down low and slap it through point
full, closer to off stump, driven to long-off

short on off stump, pulled to the right of deep square leg, and Chatara misses a run-out chance! Imam hared out of his crease, looking for a second, and was halfway down the pitch when Fakhar sent him back. The fielder threw to the bowler's end instead of the keeper's end, however, and Imam had just about enough time to regain his ground before the ball could be passed on to Murray
full, on middle stump, driven to long-on
full and wide, frees his arms to slap it hard to the right of the diving sweeper cover fielder
Nicely played. Tossed up, angling into middle stump and turning down leg. Stretches out and uses the angle to lap-sweep it nice and fine
full on off and middle, punched hard down the ground. The bowler dives left to stop it
length ball on off stump, punched to long-on
back of a length, flat, on leg stump. Wants to cramp Fakhar for room so he makes some for himself and slaps it through cover point
down the track and Wellington dangles one slower on leg stump. Clipped to the right of midwicket
The constant changes of angle aren't really helping Wellington here. Short, turning down leg, pulled to the right of long leg
length ball, fourth-stump line. Goes too early at the drive - aims for long-off and gets a thick inside-edge to midwicket
back of a length outside off, lets it come on and pushes it gently between backward point and cover
full on middle stump. Gets his front leg out of the way and drives to long-off
back of a length, close to off stump, punched to long-on
off-stump yorker, jams it out to extra-cover
full on off stump, driven with a lot of bottom hand to long-off
back of a length on off stump, punched to extra-cover

short on middle and leg and Fakhar is too early on the pull. He's working against the angle and only manages a top edge, but that top edge sails over the keeper and all the way for six. That brings up Pakistan's 150
shot. Full on off stump and he clears his front leg and simply hoicks it over wide mid-on
back of a length on off stump, stays leg-side of the ball and slaps it to backward point
back of a length on middle and leg, slightly cramped for room as he tries to cut, chops it to extra-cover
short, angling away from off stump. Fakhar misses the pull
tossed up on middle stump, driven to long-off
tossed up outside leg, turning into the stumps, defended into the on side
short, and he rocks back to pull it over midwicket. Long-on doesn't have too much ground to cover to his left but the power leaves him with no chance of cutting it off
tossed up on leg stump and he clears his front leg and slog-sweeps to the midwicket boundary
shortish, close to off stump, makes a bit of room and punches to the left of sweeper cover

short, and has he got the wicket of Fakhar Zaman? Yes, he has! This one doesn't turn, and keeps coming in with the angle, with a bit of extra bounce, as Fakhar leans back to cut. Murray, who hasn't had a great day behind the stumps, rises nicely with the bounce to catch it off the top edge
back of a length outside off, slapped to sweeper cover
back of a length outside off, punched to extra-cover
length ball outside off, gets on the front foot for a gentle push to the left of extra-cover
full, slanting away from off stump, Imam leans into a good-looking drive, eases it to the left of sweeper cover
back of a length, angling across to off stump, shuffles across and clips it into the gap between deep square leg and long leg
fullish, wide of off stump, driven to sweeper cover
low full-toss on off stump, driven to long-on
back of a length on leg stump, goes deep in his crease to flick and Wellington Masakadza dives to his right from midwicket to half-stop the ball
back of a length, goes deep in his crease and cuts to backward point
and again. Back of a length, angling into off stump, waits on it and cuts towards backward point
full on leg stump, driven to long-on
length ball turning sharply down leg. Babar leaves it alone
full on off stump, whipped to midwicket
tossed up outside off, stretches out and lap-sweeps to fine leg
flat, angling into leg stump, presses forward and clips to mid-on
flat, angling into off stump, goes back to punch to extra-cover. Hung in the air briefly before dropping down
full on off stump, driven firmly back to the bowler
shorter now, goes back to slap to deep point
back of a length, turns in from outside off, steps back and across to punch to long-on
back of a length, sliding down leg, goes back to work it to deep square leg
full, close to off stump, driven to long-on
nice length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
down the track to the flighted ball on off stump, drives inside-out to sweeper cover
length ball turning into the stumps, gets forward and clips to backward square leg
down the track now, clips this from outside off, back to the bowler
back of a length, turning down leg. Not short enough to pull and he provokes a loud lbw appeal. Clearly turning down leg, may have even struck him outside the line
fuller now, clipped to the left of midwicket
tossed up nicely on off stump, defended watchfully down the pitch
looped up full on off stump, driven to long-off
down the track and Wellington bowls it flat outside off. Drives with the turn to long-on
back of a length outside off, uses the pace to dab it gently into the third-man region
down the track and Roche bowls this wide outside off. Slapped to sweeper cover
full on off stump, whipped to long-on
full on off stump, clipped to long-on
full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
skips out of his crease and Roche bowls it full outside off. Jabbed firmly to extra-cover
length ball on off stump, clipped towards midwicket
back of a length on leg stump, and he shuffles across to tuck it away to the right of short fine leg. Poor line to bowl with the fielder in the circle
fullish, slanting away from off stump. Presses forward and pushes it to the left of extra-cover
back of a length on off stump, gets behind it and drops it with soft hands into the cover region, calls his partner through for a quick single
length ball close to off stump. Nice stride forward for the checked drive to mid-off
back of a length, slanting across to off stump, uses the pace to guide it to third man
shortish, angling into off stump, dabbed to third man
down the track to the flighted off-stump ball and Babar brings up his first boundary with a nice, lofted hit over mid-off
quicker now, turning down leg, Babar misses the flick. May have struck his pad on the way
flat and quick down leg once more, this time there's nothing on the ball and Roche concedes a wide
full on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket

flat, full, angling down leg again. Murray lets out a big appeal for a stumping here. The third umpire's looking at it. Yikes, Babar did lift his back foot momentarily, but after Murray flicked off the bails
tossed up nicely outside off, dips onto a good length. Presses forward for the push into the cover-point region
tossed up on middle stump, driven to long-off
full on off stump, driven to long-on
back of a length, angling down leg. Zimbabwe are conceding a bunch of unnecessary extras here
back of a length on off stump, makes a bit of room and chops this down to third man
back of a length, slanting away from off stump, glided down to third man
back of a length on off stump, Babar leans away from the line and picks up another single to third man
back of a length, on the pads, tucked away to the left of deep square leg
fullish on middle and off. Gets forward and clips it away to deep square leg
length ball on leg stump, defended back to the bowler
fuller now, clipped into the square leg region
full outside leg, flicked to deep square leg
down the track, clips this leg-stump ball to long-on
shuffles down the pitch, and shows the full face of his bat to this leg-stump ball and picks up a single to long-on to bring up his fourth ODI hundred. Celebrates with the sajda.
full on middle stump, driven inside-out to the right of extra-cover, who fumbles to allow a second run
full on off, and Imam comes down the wicket. Clobbers it over midwicket, but finds the fielder in the deep
full on off stump, and Babar comes forward to drive. Straight to mid off
tossed up on leg stump, and Babar nudges this to square leg for a comfortable single
length ball on middle stump, but spinning into his body. He makes room and whips it away to square leg
uses his feet! Lovely straight drive over the bowler's head. Pitched up outside off and drilled to the long-on boundary
good length on middle, and punched down the ground to long on
length ball, but wide outside off. Imam charges down the ground, but he can't get bat to ball
good length outside off again, and cut away off the back foot, but unfortunately he misses the shot, and the ball goes under his bat
wide outside off again, and this time that's been cut away to the third-man boundary
back of a length on off, and he drags a pull to the square-leg boundary. Babar calls early for the second run
back of a length outside off, and Babar contemplates ramping it over third man, but he chooses to let it go
good length on middle, and pulled away to the deep square leg region. Played into the gap, and that's another two for double
slower ball, full outside off. Defended to point
length ball on leg stump, and that's been flicked to the midwicket fielder for an easy single
full on off, and he comes forward to defend. Played to short cover

full on middle stump, and Imam goes for a wild hoick over leg side. Goes down on one knee, and the ball hits him straight in front of middle. An easy decision from the umpire, as the Zimbabwe fielder roar in delight
full on off, and pushed off the front foot to cover point
full on middle, and driven off the front foot to wide long off
good length on middle, and he comes down the wicket to push to long on
full on leg, and that's been worked off his pads to fine leg
back of a length outside off, and he drags a pull to the deep midwicket fielder. They jog across for one
good length outside off, and cut away off the back foot to deep point
full on middle, and worked off his pads to the deep midwicket boundary
back of a length on middle, and pulled to the deep backward square region. Walks across for his 7000th run
full just outside off, and worked away to the wide mid on region. No one there, and therefore they comfortably come back for the second
full just outside off, and worked away to the on side
length ball outside off, and cut off the back foot to point
full on off, and he comes down the ground, and lifts it over the midwicket region. Clears the infielder, and once Babar does that, there's no stopping him...
full on off, and pushed off the front foot to long off for a walking single
back of a length outside off, and he drills this pull to the cow corner boundary. Played along the ground by Malik for four more
good length outside off, and cut away to the deep point fielder for a walking single
full outside off, but angling into his pads. Driven straight past the non-striker to long on
good length outside off, and cut away confidently. But the shot goes straight to point
low full toss on middle, and Babar flicks this off his pads to deep midwicket
full on middle, and he waits for the slower ball to get to him. Lines up for a big slog, but eventually checks his drive to long on
full outside off, and driven away from his body. Played to cover, but intercepted by the infielder
back of a length outside off, and he pulls this to the deep midwicket fielder. Slower ball from Chatara again
good length on off, and Babar wants to cut this fine. But the ball's too close to his body, and he finds point instead
full on off, and he comes down the ground to drive. Steers it to long off
wide outside off, but Malik came dancing down the ground, and thumps it over the non-striker's head. Long on has no chance!
full on off, and pushed to long on with soft hands
wide outside off, and Babar can free his arms. Cuts it hard to the fielder square on the off side
good length outside off, and this is sliced over point's head for a single. Man in the deep
good length outside off, and he drops his gloves onto his ball, pushing it to short third man for a single
low full toss on middle, and pushed to mid on
yorked! Aimed on middle stump, and Malik gets his bat down to keep the ball away. But the ball hits him near his toes, and the umpire raises his finger. Malik smiles, indicating it hit his bat first
full on middle, and clipped off his toes to the fielder at midwicket
good length outside off, but angling into his body. Worked off his hips to the fielder at midwicket
good length outside off, and fended off the back foot. Well stopped by the bowler on his followthrough
soars into the long-on boundary! In the slot outside off stump, and Asif has a golf swing at this delivery. Punished
full on leg, and he tries to whip it away to mid wicket, but a leading edge takes the ball to cover instead
good length outside off, and cut away off the front foot. The ball rolls away to third man, but Babar puts in the hard yards, and manages to come back for two. Eighth fifty for Babar!
full, but wide outside off. Babar throws his hands at it, and crunches this to the fielder at deep extra cover
full outside off, and beautifully driven off the front foot. Timed so well, but goes straight to the fielder at cover
full on off, and he uses his wrists to caress this shot to long on. They walk across for one
back of a length outside off, and soaring over Asif's shoulder and into the keeper's gloves
beats long on! Full outside off, and Asif's big backlift allows him to tee off for this shot. Swings across the line, and connects well to earn six
good length outside off, and he misses the uppercut over shord third man. Through to Murray
short and wide outside off again, and Asif can't get bat to ball once more. Looks to cut it over point, but can't connect with the shot
full outside off, but Asif goes down on one knee to drive very square. Finds the fielder in the deep though
low full toss outside off, and this drive has been squeezed to deep extra cover. Pakistan cross 300
aims for a yorker on off stump, but Asif manages to dig this away to long on
good length outside off, and that's been crunched to the cow-corner boundary. Picks the slower ball early,and swings across the line. Lands just before the ropes
full outside off, and that's been lifted inside out over cover! Another slower ball, but Babar had no trouble picking the pace

back of a length outside off, and this time Babar carves it over point with soft hands! Chase for the infielder to the boundary, but he manages to parry the ball back as they come back for three. The umpires want to have a look whether the fielder touched the boundary or not
low full toss outside off, and this has been sliced to the fielder in the deep. Tried to go for the big shot over cover
low full toss outside off, and that's been walloped to the extra cover boundary. What great timing, but the man's there in the deep
ouch! Asif Ali is down on his knees. Looks like he's hurt his rib cage. Short ball on middle, and Asif couldn't pull this away. Took his eyes off the ball, and has paid the price for it

full and wide outside off, and Asif reaches out to try and carve it behind point. But the batsman misses this slightly quicker delivery and goes into Murray's gloves. Appeal for caught behind, but the umpire isn't interested

sliced to third man! Wide outside off once again, and this time Asif manages to reach out and drive away from his body. But the bat turned in his hand, and Asif miscues this straight to the fielder at third man
good length on off, and he flat-bats a pull to wide long on
good length on middle, and Sarfraz rides the bounce, before turning it around the corner for a single
knee-high full toss on off stump, and Babar whips this to the cow corner boundary for two. Only four runs off the over
full outside off, and tapped to point for a quick single
full outside off, and that's been check-driven over cover! Good use of the bottom hand to lift it over the infield. Classy
full on off, and Babar walks across the line before swing through to the cow-corner boundary! Off the bat's sweet spot, and the ball goes way beyond the fielder manning the ropes
knee-high full toss on middle, and this has been flicked over square leg! Almost goes for a six. Fourteen in three balls now...
slower ball, but short outside off. Babar simply settles onto the back foot and slices this over point. No real timing off the bat, but still enough to take the third run
full toss on off, and worked to the wide long on fielder. Nineteen off the over
short ball on off, and he rides the bounce, before nudging to square leg for a single
back of a length outside off, cut away to third man for a single
back of a length outside off, and that's been ramped to third man for a walking single
full outside off, and that's been creamed to the extra-cover boundary! Small backlift, but goes hard onto his shot, and smacks this four to get to his nineties
slower ball bouncer on middle, and Babar pulls over square leg with ease. Once it crosses the infield, the ball races away to the boundary. Babar on 95
full outside off, and he opens his bat's face to run it down to short third man. Keeps the strike for the final over
short ball outside off, but Babar waits for the ball and runs it down fine to the third-man boundary! Eighth ODI hundred for Babar Azam. The second fifty came off just 17 deliveries
steered past short third man for four! Classy. Yorker outside off, and Babar sticks his bat out to run it fine
yorker, but too wide outside off. Left alone by Babar
full, and wide outside off. Babar stretches out and drives to wide long off
wide outside off once again, and the umpire has no choice but to spread his arms wide
back of a length outside off, but Sarfraz plays a late cut to third man for one. Gets Babar back on strike for the final two deliveries
slower ball, but wide outside off. He muscles this cut to cover
wide yorker to end the innings. He sticks his bat out and steers this to point for a single. Pakistan finish on 364 for 4!
back of a length, starts just outside leg and straightens in slightly. Masakadza misses the flick and is hit on the thigh pad
back of a length, close to off stump, blocked into the off side
well left. Full, pitching on middle and off and continuing with the angle across. Watches it well, sees there's no swing back, and raises his bat over his head
back of a length on leg stump, tucked away to long leg
ooh, nearly. On the fuller side of a good length, slanting across and inviting the cover drive before curling back in late. Goes for the drive and inside-edges past leg stump
back of a length, a little wider outside off, lets it come on and dabs to backward point
back of a length on middle and off, defended to short extra-cover
good ball, slanting away from off stump from a good length. Kamunhukamwe was unsure whether to play or leave, and ends up edging it just wide of the diving slip fielder
short, a little too far from the body to connect with the cut, maybe, or Kamunhukamwe was late on the shot
well bowled. Fuller, slanting across to off stump, defended to short extra-cover. Not much of a stride forward
shortish, wide-ish, Kamunhukamwe slashes and misses. His back foot didn't really get across
back of a length on off stump, defended to cover point
back of a length, straightens slightly towards off stump. Wanted to punch through the covers, ended up dragging it back to the bowler
back of a length on off stump, this one's slanting away from wider on the crease. Defended into the covers
back of a length on middle and off, punched back towards the bowler
too full, too straight. Masakadza pulls his front leg out of the way and clips it away neatly, wide of mid-on

ooh, overambitious. An in-between length, angling away into the fifth-stump channel, and Masakadza is caught in an in-between position, weight on the back foot and looking to drive with an angled bat through cover. The ball beats his outside edge
back of a length on off stump, defended into the covers
play and miss. Length ball slanting away from off stump, and he goes for the drive and ends up playing inside the line
this one straightens in towards off and middle, and Kamunhukamwe stays leg-side of the ball and punches to short extra-cover
shortish, close to off stump. Gets on top of the bounce and chops it to backward point
back of a length close to off stump, defended to cover point

hooked for six! Junaid looks to surprise him with the bouncer, and it's a good one too, getting up to shoulder height around middle stump, but he deals with it brilliantly, opening up quickly and swivelling to swat it high over the long leg boundary
back of a length outside off, punched to cover point
length ball on off stump, continues to leave Masakadza with the angle. Left alone
ooh, beauty. This one's a little wider and Masakadza has a little poke at it. Beaten by the angle and the length - he wasn't able to get a big enough stride forward to it
back of a length on middle stump, punched to midwicket
length ball, straightens in towards middle stump to cramp Masakadza slightly, defended back to the bowler
back of a length close to off stump, punched to extra-cover
back of a length once more, a touch wider of off. Looks to drive on the up to mid-off but extra-cover moves quickly to intercept
back of a length, slanting across to off stump. Stays slightly leg-side of the ball to guide it down to third man

ooh, nearly a caught-and-bowled! On the fuller side of a good length, on middle stump, and Masakadza is into his drive too early. Hits it in the air, just over the bowler's head, and it comes quickly so Junaid ducks under it, wisely
back of a length on leg stump, goes back to tuck it to square leg
length ball on the pads, clipped to square leg
shortish, close to off stump, defended to cover point
back of a length on off stump, defended into the covers
back of a length close to off stump, punched firmly to mid-off
back of a length on off stump, punched back to the bowler
fullish, angling across to off stump and straightening a tiny bit. Wants to defend down the pitch, ends up playing it to midwicket off the inside half of the bat

shot! That's a Masakadza special. Jumps a couple of steps down the pitch and across his stumps, and flicks this good-length ball from off stump, against the angle, over backward square leg. It's lodged itself on a corrugated tin roof over one of the stands there
full on off stump, driven to the left of extra-cover, with a high left elbow
back of a length on off stump, punched to cover point
back of a length on off stump, defended into the covers
back of a length, angling across to off stump. Uses his wrists to play that back to the bowler. Didn't really get back and across, stayed leg-side of the ball
back of a length on off stump, lets it come and defends to cover point
back of a length on off stump, punched to extra-cover. Both these left-armers have bowled with terrific control
once again, back of a length on off stump. This time Kamunhukamwe makes himself room, goes deep in his crease, and punches it away between backward point and cover point
back of a length on leg stump, goes back to tuck it to square leg
slower ball, slanting away from off stump. Masakadza looks to defend and the ball leaves him like an offcutter and beats his outside edge. Bounces once more before reaching Sarfraz
fuller, outside off, driven with a lot of bottom wrist to extra-cover
back of a length on off stump, waits on it and dabs to third man
shortish, angling across to off stump. Hops to ride the bounce and defends, inside-edges into his pads
shortish, close to off stump, angling away from wide of the crease. Rocks right back and stabs it to the right of third man. Timed beautifully and it just races away
back of a length, down the leg side, misses the flick and there's a bit of an appeal for caught behind as Sarfraz tumbles to his left. Probably flicked his thigh pad on the way
length ball, straightening towards top of off, punched to short extra
shot. Takes a big step forward and across to whip this from outside off to the right of mid-on. Alert fielding keeps it down to one
back of a length outside off, lets it come on and steers it to the right of third man
back of a length, angling into off stump, defended back down the pitch
back of a length on off stump, looks to get on his toes and force it away through the infield. Straight to cover point, though
length ball on off stump, and that's a pretty unique shot. Clears his front leg, opens himself up, and just muscles it over long-off with a lot of bottom hand
length ball outside off, and that's been tapped to cover
full just outside off, and he tries to drive to cover. The ball angles slightly away, and goes past his bat's outside edge
good length outside off, and punched square off the back foot. Beats point, and a couple more for the Zimbabweans
full just outside off, and he tries to drive straight. The ball hits his inside-edge, and ricochets onto his pads
good length outside off, and steered to the cover fielder for one
yorker on middle, and he does well to dig this down to mid on
full outside off, and pushed to cover
flatter on middle, and punched down the ground to long on
length ball on middle, and he shuffles to the leg side to make some room. Then carves a cut to point
length ball on off, and that's been punched down the ground to long off. Fifty partnership!
tossed up just outside off, and crunched through to the fielder at deep extra cover
full on middle, and he opens his front leg to free his bat's movement. But the straight drive is swiftly blocked by Nawaz
back of a length on off, and tapped off the back foot to cover
full just outside off, and that's been driven square with the bat's open face. Man in the deep
golf swing! Comes down the ground, and meets this delivery on the full. Swings the bat through the ball's line, and the connection is excellent! Over long on
full on off, and he offers the bat's full face to drive straight. Stopped by Hasan though
good length outside off, and tapped to cover point for a quick single
full on middle, and worked away to midwicket. They want a single, but Masakadza sends his younger partner back
good length outside off, and carved off the back foot to cover point
full on leg stump, and he misses out on the sweep. Goes down the leg side, so Zimbabwe earn an extra run
full on middle, and driven down the ground to long on
length ball on leg stump, but going down the leg side. Another freebie
good length on leg stump, and he goes onto the back foot to defend
full on leg stump, and he's down on one knee to sweep! Picks this from middle stump, and places this angled sweep very fine past the infielder
full on off, and pushed away to the fielder at cover. Mistimed
good length on off, and he backs away to pull. Drags it too straight, and it's gone straight to mid on!
good length on off, and the block takes the bat's inside edge. Ricochets onto his pads thereafter
back of a length on middle, and Masakadza is pretty surprised! Goes for the pull anyway, and he top-edges it beyond fine leg

sends two stumps flying away! Squares Masakadza up. Length ball on off, and the ball angles slightly away after pitching. Masakadza tries to drive straight, but the ball goes past his outside edge, and uproots off- and middle-stump. A funny celebration too - Hasan chooses not to do the blast celebration, and instead asks his friend Shadab to celebrate for him. Remember, Hasan pulled a neck muscle the last time he tried to do that.
back of a length outside off, and he runs it down to third man. Gets off the mark
attempted yorker on leg stump, but the ball goes down leg. Wide, says the umpire
full on off, and Masvaure comes forward to defend
full on middle, and he comes forward to defend once more
full on off, and angling into the right hander. Defended to the leg side
tossed up on middle, and hits his front leg while the batsman tries to work it towards midwicket. Big appeal for lbw, but not given by the umpire. The angle would've taken it down leg stump
full on leg, and this time it's been pushed to midwicket for a quick run
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot to mid off
full outside off, and he comes forward to defend down the ground
tossed up on leg stump, but he gets behind the line of the ball, and drives back to the bowler
full on leg, and going down the leg side. Sarfraz dives to his right and stops the ball, but the umpire calls it a wide anyway
full just outside off, and he drives inside the line of the ball. Expected the ball to come into him, but the ball jagged away, and went past the outside of his bat
full on off, and Masvaure digs this away to the square-leg fielder. He's overstepped
yorker on leg stump, and Murray manages to get his toes out of the ball's way. The ball, however, raps him on his front leg, but the ball trickles away to square leg
full on middle, and that's been whipped off his toes to the vacant cow corner region. Chase for the fielder from midwicket
good length on off, but tailing into Murray's body. Defended to midwicket, and off they go for another run
full on off, and he raises his back leg to go through the line of the ball. Driven to mid on
full just outside off, but slower in the air. Defended with soft hands. Drinks as well
good length outside off, and the ball stayed low! He tried to cut, but the ball snuck under his bat, and Sarfraz does well to hold on
full on off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. Sarfraz says, 'bohut acha (very good)' to his bowler
full on middle, and worked away to the leg side for a walking single
good length outside off, and the ball's spinning into the left hander. Tries to cut it away, but misses the shot completely
full on middle, and driven down the ground to long on for a walking single
tossed up outside off, and he opens his bat's face to run it down to point
back of a length on leg stump, and that's been paddle swept to fine leg
tossed up outside off, and that's been driven expansively. Struck with some ferocity, but straight to long off
tossed up on middle, and that's been whipped off his toes to the fielder at deep midwicket
full just outside off, and defended to mid off
tossed up on off, and the wrong'un comes into Murray. Mistimed to mid on
full outside off, and spinning away from the batsman. Sticks his bat out, and defends to point
full and wide outside off, and he comes down the wicket to drive. Played to the cover fielder
length ball outside off, but spinning in sharply. Worked off his hips to square leg
uses his feet, and lifts it over the bowler's head! Played with the turn to the long-off boundary
full just outside off, and worked away to the on-side off the front foot,. Played to mid on
good length just outside off, and he goes onto the back foot, before nudging this to square leg
length ball outside off, so Masvaure checks his shot. Punches past short mid on to the fielder in the deep
full outside leg stump, and spinning down the leg side. He misses out on the sweep and the ball hits the keeper's pads
full outside off, and spinning into Murray this time. Fended back to the bowler
tossed up on off, and he tries to drive straight. The ball turns away, and induces the bat's outside edge. Flies away to square leg thereafter
good length on off, and worked away to the leg side. But the ball turns away, and takes the top of his pad and goes to short third man
full outside off, and spinning further away. He sticks his bat out, but the ball goes past his outside edge
turn and bounce! Full outside off, and spinning away from Murray once again
tossed up outside off, driven to extra-cover
back of a length, turning into middle stump, punched to long-on
length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
shot. Fullish on off stump, clipped away crisply to the left of deep square leg
tossed up outside off, defended to extra-cover
a touch closer to off stump, driven to extra-cover
flat length ball on middle and off, goes back to punch it back to Shadab
loopy full-toss on off and middle, swept down to long leg
shortish outside off, pulled to the left of midwicket. Was looking for the single to long-on but the fielder in the circle moved quickly to cut it off
quickish length ball on off stump, Murray defends without really striding forward, just collapsed his back leg
shortish outside off, pulled to long-on
beauty. Floated across towards off stump and he comes forward to defend, playing for the turn. Continues to slide on with the angle and beats the outside edge
shortish outside off, jabbed to sweeper cover
length ball on off stump, clipped to midwicket
down the track and Nawaz gets it to drift away from off stump a bit. Driven back to the bowler
back of a length on off stump, punched into the point region
back of a length on off stump, looks for the punch to long-on but doesn't get any power on it, cramped for room. Midwicket moves across to field it
a bit more room, rocks back and forces it past backward point
googly, tossed up outside off. Looks to drive into the covers, ends up hitting it back to the bowler
fuller outside off, driven hard into the covers and extra-cover, diving right, can only half-stop it and slow it down
length ball turning in towards off stump, nicely defended down the pitch. Masvaure's been getting into good positions against spin so far
length ball turning down leg, tucked away to long leg
flat slider angling into off stump, defended back down to the pitch
tossed up wide of off stump, presses forward for the push to sweeper cover
tossed up full on off stump, driven down to long-off
looks for the cover drive, ends up hitting it back to the bowler. Dangled it up slowly and got it to drift into the left-hander
quicker, angling into off stump, goes back to work it through square leg
nice length outside off, gets forward for a push into the covers
lovely length again, dips and turns in towards off stump. Nice checked drive to long-off
tossed up full, wide of off, driven to long-off
shot. Tossed up on middle stump and he makes himself room and chips it inside-out, over extra-cover, against the turn
length ball turning in from middle and leg. Gets forward and works it through square leg
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
ooh, dropped. Flicks this full one against the turn, with a lot of power, and it doesn't quite stick as Malik moves to his left at midwicket to take this chest-high chance
back of a length outside off, chopped into the backward point region
a bit of flight outside off and Murray goes after it, sinks onto his back knee to slog-sweep over the midwicket boundary
down the track, gets inside the line of this full one angling into his legs, and chips inside-out to long-off
length ball turning in towards off stump, defended back to the bowler
length ball on off stump. Looks to use his wrists and play it down to long-on but midwicket moves quickly to his left to cut it off
fuller, driven down to long-on
back of a length, sliding into the pads, worked away through square leg
tossed up on off stump, clipped to midwicket
tossed up on middle stump, clipped away to deep square leg
flat legbreak just outside off, goes back and whips to midwicket
fuller, angling slightly down leg, and Murray plays that very well, gets his head over the ball and glances it away to the right of short fine leg
googly, didn't pick it. Dips sharply wide of off stump and he drags his intended cover drive to midwicket
tossed up wide of off again, driven down to long-off
length ball on off stump, sliding on with the angle. Goes back to slap it to cover point
flighted ball on off and middle, driven back firmly to the bowler, who fumbles it and lets the ball roll into the covers

down the track and Junaid Khan drops a straightforward chance. Doesn't get close enough to the pitch to loft it safely, and it goes hiiiigh in the air, towards long-off running in off the rope. He's sliding forward to catch it near his waist, and the ball just slips through his grasp
back of a length, sliding into leg stump, worked into the square-leg region
shortish, pulled through midwicket
goes on the back foot to a flat length ball, works it away to deep midwicket
length ball on middle stump, clipped to straight midwicket
back of a length, angling across to off stump. Defends with soft hands into the cover region to pick up a quick single
length ball on off stump, defended into the point region
fullish outside off, eased off the front foot to sweeper cover
digs in the bouncer, climbs too high to worry Masvaure, who just sways perfunctorily to let it pass
length ball close to off stump, defended to extra-cover
full, angling down leg. Misses the flick and Hasan lets out a big appeal for lbw, but it's angling too far down leg
yorker close to off stump, opens his bat face and steers it down to third man
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
nice length on off stump. Comes forward, lets the ball come to him, and clips it gently to the right of midwicket
back of a length close to off stump, punched to the left of backward point
length ball turning into middle and leg, clipped to backward square leg
flighted ball outside off, driven to long-off
flat, angling down leg, too quick for Murray to connect with the paddle sweep
quickish length ball on off stump, defended to midwicket
length ball on middle, and tapped back to the non-striker

full on off, and he's lifted it over the non-striker! Looks like it's going to clear mid-on, but the ball dips late, and therefore Asif must jump forward to take the catch. Breaks a 78-run partnership
welcomed with a yorker. Aimed on off stump, and Moor does well to keep the ball away
full on off, and tailing into Moor's body. Tries to drive, but the ball is inside-edged onto his pads
back of a length outside off, and the cut has been mistimed to third man. Gets off the mark
full on off, and he leans into a straight drive off the front foot. But strikes it straight to Hasan
length ball on leg stump, and blocked off the back foot
good length on leg stump, and Moor whips it off his pads to the leg side
good length on off, and angling across Moor. Pushed to cover
good length on middle, and pushed to mid off off the front foot. They take off for a single
full on off, and driven away from his body. But finds cover once again
back of a length on leg, and the batsman sways away from the ball's line and lets this go to Sarfraz. Maiden over
length ball outside off, and he blocks it off the back foot. Rides the bounce to defend
back of a length outside off, and Murray pulls this over midwicket. Mistimes his shot, but manages to clear the infield. His highest ODI score
back of a length outside off once again! Murray attempts the pull once more, and this time it's been drilled to mid on. Falls just short of the fielder there
full outside off, and pushed to cover point for a quick single
good length on off, and it's too close to the batsman for the late cut. He gloves it - past the diving keeper's right - to third man for a single
full on off, and that's been drilled past midwicket! Slogs across the line, and muscles this between the two fielders on the leg side
full on off, and flicked off his toes to the fielder at deep midwicket
full on off, and defended off the front foot
length ball outside leg stump, and turned off his pads to the leg side. Wants a single, but the fielder comes swooping in to cancel those thoughts
full on middle and leg, and that's been tapped away to the fielder at midwicket
yorker on off, and he does well to dig it away to the off side
yorker on middle again, but Murray has a swipe at this - across the line - and mistimes a shot to midwicket
tossed up on leg stump, but angling down the leg side
flatter on middle, and he rocks back to get inside the crease. Punched to mid on

pushed over the boundary! Fakhar the guilty man. Full on off, and he slogs across the line. Fakhar was near the mid-wicket boundary, but his one-handed attempt is dropped, and eventually parried over the ropes
good length on middle, and zipping straight through. The ball stays low, and Murray does well to keep this out

middle stump! One too many, and Murray falls three runs short of a maiden half-century. Tossed up full on off, and Murray goes down on one knee to slog-sweep behind square. You-miss-I-hit stuff from Nawaz
low full toss on middle stump, tapped past the non-striker to long on for a single
good length on off, and he goes onto the back foot to punch
length ball outside off, and that cut shot has flown to Shadab at point! Tries to take a flying catch to his right, but the ball pops out of his hands. Goes down as a dropped chance
full on middle, but angling across Chigumbura. Defended to cover
slower ball, on a length on middle stump. Chigumbura looks to defend off the front foot, but the ball angles across his bat and goes into Sarfraz's gloves
attempted yorker on middle, but eventually is a full toss. Driven down the ground to mid off
full on middle and leg, and defended off the front foot. Intercepted by Amir on the followthrough
slower ball on middle stump. Pushes this length ball away to cover. Just one off the over
length ball on middle, and he shuffles across to the off side, whipping away to square leg for one
tossed up on off, and driven with the turn to long off for a single
tossed up on leg stump, and that's been driven inside-out to the bowler
flighted outside leg stump, and he paddle-sweeps this fine down the leg side! Sarfraz is not pleased
good length outside off, and cut with the spin to point
full on middle, and Chigumbura comes forward to push this back to Nawaz
good length on off, and he rides the bounce to defend. Played to mid off
yorker on middle, and Moor does well to dig this out of the blockhole. Played back to Junaid
full on off, and driven away from his body to cover
slower ball, on a leg stump. Whipped off his pads to the vacant midwicket region for a jogging single
slower ball on middle stump, and Chigumbura looked to tee off for a big shot, but he eventually check-defends to the off side
full outside off, and that's been crunched over long off! Such sweet followthrough of the bat as he drives this for half-a-dozen! What a crack
tossed up on middle, and driven to cover
flighted on leg, and worked away to the fielder at long on for a single
full outside off, and he's through his drive too early. Off the bat's top half, and goes almost into cover's hands

appeal for lbw! But not given. Length ball on off and he came down the ground to defend. Misses the shot as the ball hits his front leg. Impact was in front of off stump, so wonder what the umpire was thinking there
full on off, and thumped down the ground to long off
good length on off, and he goes onto the back foot to defend and see the over out
back of a length, close to off stump, defended into the covers
low full-toss close to off stump, driven to extra-cover
shortish outside off, steered down to third man
length ball angling into off stump from wide of the crease, defended back towards the bowler
back of a length on off stump, gets on his toes and clips to midwicket
fullish on off stump, driven to mid-off
back of a length outside off, googly. Stays a bit low and Chigumbura inside-edges his attempted back-foot punch past leg stump
shortish outside off, flat-batted to long-off
tossed up outside off, driven to sweeper cover
flat googly turning into leg stump, goes back and whips to deep square leg
another googly, tossed up and turning in towards off. Presses forward to defend into the on side
shortish outside off, stabbed to backward point
shortish, angling into the body. Looks to tuck it into the leg side and gets a blow on the glove instead
short, a bit of width, cracked away nicely, placed it well to the right of third man
yorker on off stump, jams his bat down on it and gets an inside-edge that rolls into his feet
short, angling into the body, gets up to chest height and he swivels nicely and plays a controlled pull out to long leg
short, some width again, and now it's Moor's turn to pick up a square-cut boundary. Hits it further in front of third man than Chigumbura did
length ball angling into off stump, defended to extra-cover
sharp turn outside off from a good length. Presses forward to defend and it rips past his outside edge
tossed up wide of off, driven to the left of long-off
beauty. Gets it to dip and spin away sharply, a little wider outside off, to beat Moor as he drives away from his body
googly, pitches on a good length and he hits it back to the bowler off the inside half of the bat. Wanted to drive into the covers
fuller, plays a checked drive into the covers
quickish length ball turning away from off stump, gets back and across to defend with soft hands
full, angling into middle stump, clipped away through square leg
length ball outside off, defended into the covers
slower ball, cuts in from off stump and is probably missing leg stump. Misses the flick and prompts a big lbw appeal
Length ball, nips in from outside off. Misses the flick and is hit on the pad again. Outside the line, I guess, and maybe an inside edge too. Not much of an appeal
another slower ball but this one is short, and he holds his shape nicely and pulls it just beyond the rope at deep midwicket
low full-toss outside off, driven to sweeper cover
another legbreak that beats the outside edge. He's been getting them to dip and turn in his last two overs, this one's on a wide-ish line and forces Chigumbura to reach away from his body
fuller, driven to the right of sweeper cover
quickish legbreak on off stump, a touch short, goes back to punch through cover point
googly, too short and the wide line telegraphed it too. Goes back to punch to sweeper cover
floated up full on middle and leg, clipped past the diving bowler to long-on
short, turning down leg, pulled to long leg
half-tracker on off stump, pulled hard to the right of long-on and the fielder has to dive to save the boundary
shortish outside off, stabbed into the covers
back of a length close to off stump, punched towards extra-cover, who moves quickly to to stop it
back of a length on off stump, punched to long-off
full, almost in the blockhole, on middle stump. Driven to long-off
tossed up full on off stump, driven to extra-cover
flighted ball on off stump, driven back to the bowler
length ball on off stump, presses forward, lets it come on, and defends into the gap to the left of extra-cover
quickish length ball on off stump, defended into the point region
tossed up full on middle stump, driven to long-off
full on off stump, pushed to short cover
long-hop turning in from outside off, and Moor clatters it over the midwicket boundary
slants it wide of off, Moor leaves it alone
shortish on middle and leg, pulled along the ground to deep square leg
back of a length outside off, punched to extra-cover
length ball on off stump, goes back and clips it back to the bowler
loopy and slow outside leg, sweeps to long leg for one
